notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: M.K. Aslam designed the project, conducting synthesis, and electrochemical tests. I.D. Seymour and N. Katyal did the DFT calculations. S. Li helped with the figures. T.T. Yang carried out the thermogravimetry experiments and purchased chemicals. G. Henkelman supervised the DFT calculations. S.J. Bao and M.W. Xu jointly supervised the project.
